column4: Is it the DVD drive that's bad or the disk? Do you have an OS installed currently?
I don't think anything is 'bad' at all.  It just isn't showing up in the regular boot order list so I haven't been able to use it to install 10.10
I meant your comment "the only DVD I have is a bit manky".
oh, yes, it's the disc that's a bit degraded.
